pages.title: The unknown is an opportunity to learn.
pages.description: Hi! I'm Tony, a self-taught creative thinker. I like to use multiple mediums to express my thoughts and ideas. I'm passionate about stories that have humanity, empathy and food.

meta_component.meta_title: Tony de Faria - Storytelling through photography
meta_component.meta_description: Born in Africa and raised in Europe. Has a curious and creative mindset, leading to experimenting with all sorts of mediums. Passionate about Humanity.

pages.title: Street & Travel.

pages.title: Reach out.
pages.description:
Do you have a question?
Are you curious about my work?

Well, get in touch. I will happily reply, and hopefully, I will be able to help.

meta_component.meta_title: Tony de Faria - Get in touch
meta_component.meta_description: Be it through a video call, while grabbing a coffee or via email. Tony is responsive and always open to conversation. So get in touch; he will try to help if he feels fit to do so.
